title: TO CARRY YOUR CROSS
bible_ref: If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor,â€¦ and come and follow me. Matt. 19:21
verses: Saviour, come! We long to see Thee,=Long to dwell with Thee above;=And to know in full communion,=All the sweetness of Thy love=Come, Lord Jesus! Come, Lord Jesus!=Take my waiting people home.=Come, Lord Jesus! Come, Lord Jesus!=Take my waiting people home.=To carry your cross and follow the Lord=It means you're saying goodbye=To the world you concede your right=To Jesus you yoke your neck=Following Him wherever He leads=Following Him wherever He leads
